eecs.jago.element
Interface Destructible

All Known Implementing Classes:
Detonator, DozerBot, Mine, PushableBomb
public interface Destructible

This interface describes any object that can be destroyed during the course of the simulation. In this context, the object will change state, perhaps react to its surroundings, and the visual representation will change when the element is destroyed.

Since:
4.1

Field Summary
static int DESTROYED
          Indicates that the element was destroyed.
 
Method Summary
 boolean isDestroyed()
          Returns the current state of this object.

          Sets the flag indicating if this object was destroyed.
